content:
This code chunk initializes key variables and flags in an avatar controls class. The variables include state flags (e.g., `mayJump`, `isAirborne`), speed parameters (`forwardSpeed`, `jumpForce`), task references, and movement-related data. This initialization is part of the class setup to control avatar physics and movements in a 3D environment.

self.mayJump = 1
        self.jumpDelayTask = None

        self.controlsTask = None
        self.indicatorTask = None

        self.falling = 0
        self.needToDeltaPos = 0
        self.physVelocityIndicator=None
        self.avatarControlForwardSpeed=0
        self.avatarControlJumpForce=0
        self.avatarControlReverseSpeed=0
        self.avatarControlRotateSpeed=0
        self.getAirborneHeight=None

        self.priorParent=Vec3(0)
        self.__oldPosDelta=Vec3(0)
        self.__oldDt=0

        self.moving=0
        self.speed=0.0
        self.rotationSpeed=0.0
        self.slideSpeed=0.0
        self.vel=Vec3(0.0)
        self.collisionsActive = 0

        self.isAirborne = 0
        self.highMark = 0
